image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives, Gift of Joe Foley; Coach for the Democrats team, 1974-2020

profileText: A Representative from Nevada; born in Guadalajara, Mexico, April 25, 1980; graduated from Rancho High School, Las Vegas, Nev., 1998; attended College of Southern Nevada, Henderson, Nev.; B.S., University of Nevada, Las Vegas, Nev., 2004; academic adviser, College of Southern Nevada, Henderson, Nev.; staff, United States Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, 2004-2006; member of the Nevada state assembly, 2007-2010; member of the Nevada state senate, 2011-2016, majority whip, 2013-2014, minority whip, 2015; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-January 3, 2019); was not a candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress in 2018.

asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives, Gift of Joe Foley; Coach for the Democrats team, 1974-2020
